participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and wise with a strong connection to nature.
participant_1.background: I'm not worried about what others think of my appearance as long as I feel comfortable in my own skin. I'm interested in learning more about how to grow organic food at home, so I can save money and have more control over what my family eats. My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet. I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts. I am an old woman who lives on a social security check.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, with a rebellious streak.
participant_2.background: I'm an adult who sometimes gets into fights, and I've created my own personal religion. I can't get enough of Lindsey Stirling's music. Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college. I'm going back to school. I am more concerned with my creations than my appearance.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm excited to be going back to school next semester.
That's great! I'm going back to school too. I'm taking some classes on organic gardening.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to grow my own food.
It's not too hard! You just need some good soil, seeds, and a little bit of sunlight.
I'll have to look into it. I love Lindsey Stirling's music too!
Me too! She's so talented. I saw her in concert a few years ago and it was amazing.
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to see her in concert.
You should definitely go if she comes to your area!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What's your favorite Lindsey Stirling song?
I love all of her songs, but my favorite is probably "Crystallize."
That's a good one! Mine is probably "Roundtable Rival."
That's a good one too! I love the violin in that song.
Yeah, it is. I'm so glad we got to talk about Lindsey Stirling.
